allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove sample and test files for production readiness

- Delete sample_invoices directory and sample invoice text file
- Delete tests directory with test_agents.py
- Update .gitignore to fully exclude data/ directory from version control
- Add additional database file patterns \(.sqlite, .sqlite3\) to .gitignore
- Remove obsolete sample_invoices patterns from .gitignore

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
